package.name: gcc48
package.patch: cd gcc-${PKGVERSION} sed -i 's/install_to_$(INSTALL_DEST) //' libiberty/Makefile.in case `uname -m` in i?86) sed -i 's/^T_CFLAGS =$/& -fomit-frame-pointer/' gcc/Makefile.in ;; esac sed -i 's@\./fixinc\.sh@-c true@' gcc/Makefile.in # sed -i 's/getline/get_line/' libiberty/testsuite/test-demangle.c
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build export CC="/usr/local/gcc52/bin/gcc52" export CXX="/usr/local/gcc52/bin/g++52" if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] && which distcc ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc /usr/local/gcc52/bin/gcc52" export CXX="distcc /usr/local/gcc52/bin/g++52" fi ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr/local/${PKGNAME} \ --enable-shared \ --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit \ --enable-clocale=gnu --enable-languages=c,c++,fortran,java,lto,objc,obj-c++,go \ --disable-multilib --with-system-zlib --program-suffix=48 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then make -j $jobcount else make -j 4 fi
